interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Environment.WindDirection
interface.description: This interface is for controlling wind direction of a device.

property.name: HorizontalWind
property.description: Horizontal wind direction of a device

property.name: HorizontalMax
property.description: Maximum value allowed for a target horizontal wind direction

property.name: HorizontalAutoMode
property.description: Represent enabled/disabled state of the horizontal auto mode. HorizontalAutoMode is for controlling horizontal wind direction automatically.

property.name: VerticalWind
property.description: Vertical wind direction of a device

property.name: VerticalMax
property.description: Maximum value allowed for a target vertical wind direction

property.name: VerticalAutoMode
property.description: Represent enabled/disabled state of the vertical auto mode. VerticalAutoMode is for controlling vertical wind direction automatically.
